overview: Sandy has gone her whole life without "doing it," despite working in the erotically charged atmosphere of an adult book-store. When her friends discover Sandy's secret, they make it their mission to make sure their pal is deflowered. Will she survive the experience or will she find true love with the hunky nerd with a fondness for blow-up dolls?
tagline: There's a first time for everything!
title: The 19 Year Old Virgin
